title: "MIT AI system knows when to make a medical diagnosis or defer to an expert"
excerpt: "AI can now detect lung, breast, brain, skin and cervical cancer. But in the world of medical AI, figuring out when to rely on experts versus algorithms is still tricky. It’s not simply a matter of who is “better” at making a diagnosis or prediction."
